channel.title: ansible on Serban Balamaci
channel.description: Recent content in ansible on Serban Balamaci

item.title: Using Vagrant and Ansible to setup Jenkins
item.author: thespamtrapp@gmail.com (Serban Balamaci)
item.description: Part 2 on setting up a Jenkins machine with plugins. Since the previous article, I’ve been asked by people what is Vagrant and how they can use it. Somehow I took this for granted and I did not consider it a key subject in our CI journey.
